description: D3 plugin which computes a Weighted Voronoi tesselation
name: d3-weighted-voronoi

scripts.precommit: yarn run test && uglifyjs build/d3-weighted-voronoi.js -c -m -o build/d3-weighted-voronoi.min.js
scripts.prepublish: zip -j build/d3-weighted-voronoi.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-weighted-voronoi.js build/d3-weighted-voronoi.min.js
scripts.pretest: yarn run build && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/utils.js -- ./src/utils.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/plane3D.js -- ./src/plane3D.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/conflictList.js -- ./src/conflictList.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/vertex.js -- ./src/vertex.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/vector.js -- ./src/vector.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/hEdge.js -- ./src/hEdge.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/face.js -- ./src/face.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/convexHull.js -- ./src/convexHull.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/powerDiagram.js -- ./src/powerDiagram.js && rollup -f umd -n vanilla --o build/d3-polygon-clip.js -- ./src/d3-polygon-clip.js
